question: Match the type of adaptation given in List I with their examples given in List II.
List I: 1. Biochemical adaptation, 2. Behavioural adaptation, 3. Physiological adaptation, 4. Morphological adaptation
List II: p. Desert lizards, q. Deep sea fishes, r. Opuntia, s. Kangaroo rats
explanation: Deep sea fishes show biochemical adaptations (1-q), Desert lizards show behavioral adaptations (2-p), Kangaroo rats show physiological adaptations (3-s), and Opuntia shows morphological adaptations (4-r).
